#summary Scheduled talks about Native Client
#labels Featured

To help the community learn more about Native Client,
we're giving technical talks at conferences and major universities.
We've scheduled the following talks:

<wiki:toc />

<wiki:comment>
Watch this page for information about future talks.
Watch this page for more details on these talks. 
</wiki:comment>

If you can't attend a talk, please watch the
[http://code.google.com/events/io/sessions/NativeClientUsingNativeCode.html Google I/O video] (with [http://dl.google.com/io/2009/pres/Th_1200_NativeClientUsingNativeCodetoBuildComputeIntensiveWebApplications.pdf PDF slides]).
You can also watch the
[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L8m9U7p_Ntk Stanford video]
and its [http://nativeclient.googlecode.com/svn/data/site/NaCl_Talk_Jan09.pdf PDF slides] or the [http://velocityconference.blip.tv/file/2293252/ Velocity video].
